DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to validate of a predictive nomogram of response or resistance to targeted therapies in metastatic clear cell renal cell carcinoma
DOC.brief_title: Validation of a Predictive Nomogram of Response or Resistance to Targeted Therapies in Metastatic Clear Cell Renal Cell Carcinoma
DOC.criteria: patients with metastatic ccRCC Underwent nephrectomy at the University Hospital of Rennes treated by sunitinib first line treatment translocation renal cell carcinoma other targeted therapies before the sunitinib
